Package com.echodrop.gameboy.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MemoryRegion
    Represents a logical block of memory in the emulator's RAM
    MMU
    Emulation core for GameBoy Memory Management Unit.
    OpCode
    Represents a GameBoy Z80 CPU instruction
    Register
    Represents ann 8-bit internal register
    TailspinGB
    This class represents a combination of the components required for the emulator to run
    Util
    Contains miscellaneous utilities that are used throughout the codebase.
    Z80
    Emulation core for Z80 microprocessor
